attributes.action: Reduce the financial pressures on households by scrapping the immoral tax free allowances and expenses scheme enjoyed by MPs.
attributes.additional_details: If MPs had any shame, any integrity, any honour, any probity and finally ANY concern for the people of this country, they would wipe out the national deficit by scrapping their allowances and expenses scams AND allow the re-floating of our entire economy by refusing to accept the use of taxpayer pounds to reduce the price of their collective alcohol addiction habit in the Palace of Westminster.
